revised_title: The Return of Radio Waves from the Middle Atmosphere: Exploring Echoes and Reflexion Coefficients
tldr: This article discusses the return of radio waves from the middle atmosphere and explores the echoes and reflexion coefficients in the ionosphere. The authors conducted experiments using pulse techniques and discovered multiple reflexions from different heights, leading to a better understanding of radio wave propagation in the atmosphere.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Atmospheric Science
